video:video.video:title: LDS General Conference 2017 Trailer
video:video.video:description:
SHARE THIS VIDEO #LDSconf #ShareGoodness Unofficial Fan Made Trailer (English, Spanish, and Portuguese subtitles available)
SUBSCRIBE if you'd like future content
Not created by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
Song is Wake of the Martyrs by Secession Studios
Compiled and created by Ryan Gurr and Joshua Rasband, they're great dude. Then re-edited and updated by Quinn Pitcher.
I am not collecting money from this video, any ads are because of the song that I do not own.

video:video.video:title: October 2017 General Women's Session
video:video.video:description:
Watch the October 2017 General Women's Session.
If streaming issues occur, please visit this link: https://www.lds.org/?lang=eng&player=nbc Subscribe to Mormon Channel for the latest videos: http://bit.ly/1M0iPwY
Download the Mormon Channel App iOS: http://bit.ly/1yGRgRU Android: http://bit.ly/1ukxbeC
